item.title: Overview
item.description: Overview In Phase 1?: “Yes, but for phase 1 keep changes to existing doc as minimal as possible” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: Existing doc: changes needed Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: This document needs to be thoroughly reexamined. We need to remove content not related to API Access Management such as content that discusses Web apps and OIDC.

item.title: Add OAuth access token support to your Rest API
item.description: Add OAuth access token support to your Rest API In Phase 1?: “Yes, it’s existing content requiring little to no change” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: Existing doc: no changes identified Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Dimensioned by: Language Links to original docs: - Protect your API endpoints:Â https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/protect-your-api/aspnetcore3/main/ Validation: A majority of oktane customers placed “API Service Integration” under “Authentication for service apps”
